entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023
